0.1.name: wordpress/email-notification-on-comment-approval
0.1.description:
This is a WordPress Plugin for inform a comment author on the approval of author comment on WordPress site. This Plugin have a admin panel setting page where you can add CC and BCC for mail.

This plugin will send a HTML email content so you can send content design as you want.

This Plugin have a HTML editor in its setting page section to design mail body.

You can insert code for site URL, Comment page URL And Site name as dynamic mail content . You can do it by inserting [site_url], [comment_url] and [site_name]. Key Featurs

HTML editor
HTML email
Dynamic URLs in mail
Option to add CC and BCC
Email Content Editor
